scripts.build:package: rimraf ./data-plugin*.tgz && node-pre-gyp install --directory=./node_modules/sqlite3 --target_platform=darwin --target_libc=unknown --target_arch=x64 && node-pre-gyp install --directory=./node_modules/sqlite3 --target_platform=darwin --target_libc=unknown --target_arch=arm64 && node-pre-gyp install --directory=./node_modules/sqlite3 --target_platform=linux --target_libc=glibc --target_arch=x64 && node-pre-gyp install --directory=./node_modules/sqlite3 --target_platform=win32 --target_libc=unknown --target_arch=x64 && npm run build && npm pack
